channel.title: RuneFection - Team Needed
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/x6stg.png[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]Server Base: VengeanceX[/b][/u]
[u][b]Server Features:[/b][/u]
[b]- Vote for pvp points system. - 100% perfect hybriding and switching. - 508 maps. - Edgeville pking/bank. - Many spots to pk. - Minigames. - Donator benefits and shops. - Donator points, can use for donator shops. - Perfect pking with pvp points rewards. - PvP point shop with decent items. - Quest tab spawning + commands. - Master/setlevel/and much more. - Working magic spells and everything. - 600+ animations. - AND THERES ALOT MORE![/b][/center]
[center][u][b]What must be accomplished and successful:[/b][/u]
- I want to see my own staff team being dedicated and supportive, ingame and on forums. Server coders and client developers will get to have fun ofcourse, not just code 24/7. We want to reach atleast 10+ players on our first day, The server is currently ready to be launched, just need the staff to be ready and everything. Forums will come.
[center][u][b]Available staff positions:[/b][/u]
[b]- Moderator (2 spots) - Server coders (1 spots) - Client developer (1 spots)
Me, myself i am a Web master, so the forums and everything will be done and controlled by me.[/b]
[u][b]Mod Application Form:[/b][/u]
[code] - What can you bring to runefection: - Why do you want to be staff: - Are you going to be dedicated and supportive: - Msn/skype:[/code]
[u][b]Server Coder Form:[/b][/u]
[code]- Java coding experience: - What would you rate yourself out of 10 as a coder: - What can you code for server: example: npc's/minigames/commands... - Are you going to be dedicated and supportive: - Msn/Skype:[/code]
[u][b]Client Developer Form:[/b][/u]
[code] - Java Experience: - What can you code for clients: - Are you going to be dedicated and supportive: - Msn/Skype:[/code]
[i][b]SERVER CODERS AND CLIENT DEVELOPERS MUST HAVE DROPBOX![/b][/i]
[i][b]Please apply with the following forms depending on what your applying for. Ill be reviewing your application and consider.[/b][/i]
[b]Thank you, Anthony[/b][/center]

item.title: RuneFection - Team Needed
item.dc:creator: @logic_btw logic btw
item.description:
@logic_btw wrote:

Anthony i was wondering what happen to ur server i was willing to help u in the server and bring people to play on it. i have good ideas that i can give u so the server can be better. im always online and looking for servers. reply bak to me asap

Read full topic

item.title: RuneFection - Team Needed
item.dc:creator: @dclawed dclawed
item.description:
@dclawed wrote:

  • What can you bring to runefection: The fact it is a server with friendly people, and that
  • Why do you want to be staff: I am experienced in runescape and rsps, I played for about 3 years, I am helpful, active, take issues how they should be dealt with, I can make guide, I have good english and can speak a few different languages.
  • Are you going to be dedicated and supportive: Ofcourse, all the support you need.
  • Msn/skype: Yes, private message me if you want my MSN.

I hope this server turns out with many people, also I will probably make a promotional video on youtube and advertise alot, also you seem like a great guy and I hope we can be mates and get to know each other.

Thanks
-Dclawed-

Read full topic

item.title: RuneFection - Team Needed
item.dc:creator: @Anthony24 Anthony24
item.description:
@Anthony24 wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:9, topic:439055”]- Java coding experience: ALOT

  • What would you rate yourself out of 10 as a coder: 7
  • What can you code for server: example: npc’s/minigames/commands…: ALL OF THESE AND MORE
  • Are you going to be dedicated and supportive: YES
  • Msn/Skype: SKYPE: RSSKILLS123[/quote]

Accepted!

item.title: RuneFection - Team Needed
item.dc:creator: @xraviin xraviin
item.description:
@xraviin wrote:

[center]- What can you bring to runefection: My people skills. I know how to deal with people. I have been moderator on 3 servers, and administrator on 1. I saw all three of those servers go down, and I want to help this one out in my spare time.

  • Why do you want to be staff: I feel that with my help and dedication, this server can prosper.
  • Are you going to be dedicated and supportive: Yes, I will be more than supportive swell as dedicated.
  • Msn/skype:parekh.ravin@live.com[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: RuneFection - Team Needed
item.dc:creator: @Lelex123 Lelex123
item.description:
@Lelex123 wrote:

  • What can you bring to runefection: A more friendly ingame experience
  • Why do you want to be staff: Because I like to play private servers with no spammers, no hackers and I want a friendly game with no damn people that kills the game.
  • Are you going to be dedicated and supportive: Of course
  • Msn/skype: umm, I have only mail...rspsplayerusa@gmail.com
    I hope I can qualify.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneFection - Team Needed
item.dc:creator: @Anthony24 Anthony24
item.description:
@Anthony24 wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:5, topic:439055”]- Java coding experience:4 years

  • What would you rate yourself out of 10 as a coder:Java as a whole, 6/10. Java as it pertains to RSPS 8/10
  • What can you code for server: example: npc’s/minigames/commands… Almost anything, I especially like to code new original content that is not in other rsps or runescape.
  • Are you going to be dedicated and supportive:supportive yes, dedicated as much as i can be with my limited schedule.
  • Msn/Skype:ashton.51

I was the server developer for a number of servers, The most successful being Overloadx. If you remember us we had the most votes on mopar at our peak and around 200+ players online at any given time.[/quote]

You seem pro and decent mate, accepted. Added you on skype!

Read full topic

item.title: RuneFection - Team Needed
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

  • Java coding experience:4 years
  • What would you rate yourself out of 10 as a coder:Java as a whole, 6/10. Java as it pertains to RSPS 8/10
  • What can you code for server: example: npc’s/minigames/commands… Almost anything, I especially like to code new original content that is not in other rsps or runescape.
  • Are you going to be dedicated and supportive:supportive yes, dedicated as much as i can be with my limited schedule.
  • Msn/Skype:ashton.51

I was the server developer for a number of servers, The most successful being Overloadx. If you remember us we had the most votes on mopar at our peak and around 200+ players online at any given time.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneFection - Team Needed
item.dc:creator: @Anthony24 Anthony24
item.description:
@Anthony24 wrote:

Loveandpower:

This is just my thoughts but two server programmers and two client programmers is too many. Perhaps if you had a very large playerbase

Oh your right, ill change that to 1, didnt think about it that way. thanks!

- What can you bring to runefection: Will be active, willing to support any member. Help out find bugs, advertise, give many suggestions and gfx. - Why do you want to be staff: Just to help out and act as a role model. - Are you going to be dedicated and supportive: Yes, and I will be having fun doing it. - Msn/skype: skype: alex.shawrs10

Accepted.

Read full topic
